overview: After rejecting her husband for the devious test he subjected her to in the first Pleasure Hunt, Sharon gets a letter from his attorney. When she goes to see him, he tells her that her husband has keeled over because of the depression brought on by her rejection. The good news is that he's left her $1.5 million and another map. This map leads to a guru who will prepare her to lead the world in the coming "Age of the Woman."
title: The Pleasure Hunt 2
